name: Pocket Camera: Lost in New York
name_original: Pocket Camera: Lost in New York
description:
Collect 64 MONs in Manhattan!

  • Move: Arrow Keys (D-PAD)
  • Pocket Camera / Interact: Z ( A )
  • Hoverboard (from Prof. O'Kang): X + Z ( B + A )
  • Start Game / Return Home: Enter ( Start )

Suitable for play on GB, GBC, GBA, Web, Mobile, and physical cartridge.

This Space World Demo was built in two weekends for GBJAM8.

Engine: GB Studio 2 Beta, Piskel, Imagemagick.

Art: Transportation Photos (Toy Taxis, Subway) by David Friedman / ironicsans.com

Music: GB-Studio-Community (main theme- Great Melody 01.mod)

Resources: Spriters Resource, Pixel Pete YouTube videos, The Cutting Room Floor, and Lava Cut Content. 

Rivals: Iwata, Itoi, and Tajiri.
